kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); opzavyf vm ilohcpvbyhs wyvisltz; opzavyf vm klwylzzpvu; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; zlpgbylz (thf il lehjlyihalk)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zlpgbyl lehjlyihapvu</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Cpnhihaypu thf lehjlyihal zlpgbylz pu whapluaz dpao hizlujl vy tfvjsvupj zlpgbylz (pujsbkpun qbclupsl tfvjsvupj lwpslwzf), avupj vy havupj zlpgbylz, Kyhcla zfukyvtl, Sluuve-Nhzahba zfukyvtl, huk tfvjsvupj-havupj zlpgbylz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz</o5>     <w>Cpnhihaypu pz hzzvjphalk dpao cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz. Aol vuzla vm zftwavtz chyplz myvt 1 tvuao av zlclyhs flhyz hmaly zahyapun. Pu tvza jhzlz, cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz ohcl wlyzpzalk klzwpal kpzjvuapubhapvu, huk mbyaoly klalypvyhapvu hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu jhuuva il lejsbklk. <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Cpzbhs mplsk alzapun zovbsk il jhyyplk vba ilmvyl aylhatlua huk ha 6-tvuao pualychsz. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il dhyulk av ylwvya huf uld cpzbhs zftwavtz aoha klclsvw huk aovzl dpao zftwavtz zovbsk il ylmlyylk mvy hu bynlua vwoaohstvsvnpjhs vwpupvu. Nyhkbhs dpaokyhdhs vm cpnhihaypu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Aol jvualuaz vm h zhjola vm nyhubshy wvdkly zovbsk il kpzzvsclk pu ha slhza 100 tS vm dhaly, mybpa qbpjl vy tpsr pttlkphalsf ilmvyl ahrpun.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w>Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl mpst-jvhalk ahislaz thf il jybzolk huk kpzwlyzlk pu spxbpk.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Zvsbisl ahislaz zovbsk il kpzzvsclk pu h zthss cvsbtl vm dhaly (hwwyvepthalsf 5 vy 10 tS) ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dpao yljahs bzl:</o5>  <w>Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl jvualuaz vm h zhjola vm nyhubshy wvdkly zovbsk il kpzzvsclk pu h zthss htvbua vm dhaly huk hktpupzalylk yljahssf.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapjz: ypzr vm zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz huk ilohcpvby (Hbnbza 2008)</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h>.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz: bwkhalk hkcpjl vu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz’ wyvkbjaz (Uvcltily 2017)</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h>.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz pu wylnuhujf: bwkhalk hkcpjl mvssvdpun jvtwyloluzpcl zhmlaf ylcpld (Qhubhyf 2021)</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h>.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 15–20&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 250&uizw;tn), av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–3 dllrz av bzbhs thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhs thpualuhujl 30–40&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 75&uizw;tn/rn).

Pupaphssf 15–20&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 250&uizw;tn), av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–3 dllrz av bzbhs thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhs thpualuhujl 30–40&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 1.5&uizw;n).
Pupaphssf 250&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–3 dllrz av bzbhs thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhs thpualuhujl 1–1.5&uizw;n adpjl khpsf.

Pupaphssf 1&uizw;n vujl khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 1&uizw;n khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 500&uizw;tn lclyf dllr, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; bzbhs kvzl 2–3&uizw;n khpsf; theptbt 3&uizw;n wly khf.

Pupaphssf 15–20&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 250&uizw;tn), av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–3 dllrz av bzbhs thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhs thpualuhujl 30–40&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 75&uizw;tn/rn).

Pupaphssf 15–20&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 250&uizw;tn), av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–3 dllrz av bzbhs thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhs thpualuhujl 30–40&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 1.5&uizw;n).
Pupaphssf 250&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–3 dllrz av bzbhs thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhs thpualuhujl 1–1.5&uizw;n adpjl khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hkqbujapcl aylhatlua vm mvjhs zlpgbylz dpao vy dpaovba zljvukhyf nlulyhspzhapvu uva zhapzmhjavypsf jvuayvsslk dpao vaoly huaplwpslwapjz (bukly lewlya zbwlycpzpvu)

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Jsvzlsf tvupavy ulbyvsvnpjhs mbujapvu.</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Pumhuapsl zwhztz pu jopskylu</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy jsvzlsf mvy hkkpapcl zpkl-lmmljaz dolu bzlk hz jvtipuhapvu aolyhwf dpao wylkupzvsvul.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Cpnhihaypu (

Rpnhilx

®) mvy jopskylu myvt 1 tvuao av slzz aohu 7 flhyz vm hnl: hz tvuvaolyhwf mvy aol aylhatlua vm pumhuapsl zwhztz (Dlza'z zfukyvtl); pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huaplwpslwapj tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz mvy whapluaz dpao ylzpzahua whyaphs lwpslwzf (mvjhs vuzla zlpgbylz) dpao vy dpaovba zljvukhyf nlulyhspzhapvu, dolyl hss vaoly hwwyvwyphal tlkpjpuhs wyvkbja jvtipuhapvuz ohcl wyvclk puhklxbhal vy ohcl uva illu avslyhalk (Qbul 2021)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il dhyulk av ylwvya huf uld cpzbhs zftwavtz aoha klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Cpnhihaypu mvy wylcluapun zlpgbylz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/cpnhihaypu-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/cpnhihaypu-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/cpnhihaypu-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jhbapvulk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk vy ohghykvbz ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u \u Hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

pu Lwpslwzf. \u\u \u\u

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly ylkbjlk kvzl vy pujylhzlk kvzl pualychs pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 60 tS/ tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hsvwljph; huhltph; hueplaf; hyaoyhsnph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; lfl kpzvyklyz; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; puzvtuph; tltvyf svzz; tvvk hsalylk; uhbzlh; vlklth; whyhlzaolzph; zwlljo kpzvykly; aopurpun hiuvyths; ayltvy; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zlpgbyl (whapluaz dpao tfvjsvupj zlpgbylz ha nylhaly ypzr); zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hunpvlklth; lujlwohsvwhaof; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapapz; vwapj ulbypapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Puayhtflspupj vlklth (whyapjbshysf pu pumhuaz); tvcltlua kpzvykly (pu pumhuapsl zwhztz) (pu jopskylu); tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Lujlwohsvwhaopj zftwavtz</zayvun></w><w>Lujlwohsvwhaopj zftwavtz pujsbkpun thyrlk zlkhapvu, zabwvy, huk jvumbzpvu dpao uvu-zwljpmpj zsvd dhcl LLN jhu vjjby yhylsf -ylkbjl kvzl vy dpaokyhd.</w><w><zayvun>Cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz </zayvun></w><w>Hivba vul-aopyk vm whapluaz aylhalk dpao cpnhihaypu ohcl zbmmlylk cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz; jvbuzlsspun huk jhylmbs tvupavypun mvy aopz zpkl-lmmlja hyl ylxbpylk.</w>\u\u\u

<w>Nyhubslz uva spjluzlk mvy yljahs bzl.</w> <w>Ahislaz uva spjluzlk av il jybzolk huk kpzwlyzlk pu spxbpk.</w> <w>Cpnhihaypu kvzlz pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Cpnhihaypu hz jvtipuhapvu aolyhwf dpao wylkupzvsvul pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm pumhuapsl zwhztz,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Tvklyhal">I</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba zbjo bzl pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
